entities.label: VCORE 600mV floor issue
entities.description: VCORE voltage dropped to 600mV, below the expected minimum of 575mV.
entities.source_text: VCORE 600mV 的一個地板（最低應為 VCORE 575mV）

entities.label: VCORE 725mV high usage
entities.description: VCORE voltage at 725mV exceeded expected usage by 10%, reaching 52.51%.
entities.source_text: VCORE 725mV超過預期10%的使用率來到52.51%

entities.label: MMDVFS
entities.description: MMDVFS is a component related to voltage and frequency scaling.
entities.source_text: MMDVFS的資料來看，有OPP3的100%使用率，而MMDVFS OPP3會影EVCORE 600mV

entities.label: Total DDR usage
entities.description: Total DDR usage was 54.14%, close to VCORE 725mV.
entities.source_text: 總共比例是54.14%.與VCORE 725mV 接近

entities.label: CM related issue
entities.description: The issue might be related to CM due to lack of DDR voting mechanism.
entities.source_text: 因為沒有DDR投票機制，先猜測可能與CM相關

entities.label: CPU usage
entities.description: High usage observed in small core at 2100MHz, medium core at 2500MHz, and large core at 2700MHz.
entities.source_text: 小核2100MHz，中核2500MHz，大核2700MHz 有高的使用率

entities.label: DDR and CM related
entities.description: The DDR scaling issue is confirmed to be related to CM and control strategy.
entities.source_text: 可以確認這次DDR拉檔與CM相關.這部分同樣與調控策略相關

relations.evidence: FFLX VCORE 600mV的地板是因為MMDVFS OPP3所造成.

causal_effect.mechanism: MMDVFS OPP3 usage affects the VCORE voltage, causing it to drop to 600mV.

relations.evidence: 所以DDR造成 VCORE 725mV檔位拉升.

causal_effect.mechanism: High total DDR usage increases the VCORE voltage to 725mV.

relations.evidence: 因為沒有DDR投票機制，先猜測可能與CM相關，所以先看CPU資訊來確認從CPU的部分可以看到 小核2100MHz，中核2500MHz，大核2700MHz 有高的使用率，可以確認這次DDR拉檔與CM相關.
從CPU的部分可以看到 小核2100MHz，中核2500MHz，大核2700MHz 有高的使用率，可以確認這次DDR拉檔與CM相關.
